title: CloudWalker Spectra 109 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED TV  (43AF)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 LED TV Unit
Remote Control
2 AAA Batteries
User Manual
Warranty Card
Sales Invoice Copy
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: HDMI: 480i, 480p, 720p, 1080i, 1080p, USB: MPG, AVI, TS, MOV, MKV, DAT, MP4, VOB, FLV, 3GP, TRP, ASF
product_specification.Other Video Features: Picture Support Format (USB): JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 20 W Box Speakers for powerful sound,Audio Equaliser,Adjustable Audio Modes,Language selection mode (Audio track)
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features:
AV Output: 1
PC Audio: 1
HDMI-2 Support ARC
YPbPr: 1
HDCP Version: 1.4
AV (In): 1
Line-out
VGA: 1
HDMI Version: 1.4
product_specification.Other Dimensions: Packaging Dimension (W x D x H): 1085 x 150 x 667 mm, Gross Weight: 9.8 kg
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.A+ Grade IPS Panel: This LED TV screen with the A+ Grade IPS panel offers a high-quality viewing experience with accurate, closer-to-life colours and a wide viewing angle. The strong build quality ensures durability.
product_description.Full HD Resolution: The 1920x1080 pixels resolution offers crystal clear and detailed visuals.

review:
Received it today and writing this review after watching 3 movies (approx usage 4 hours).
Delivery:-
On time and the delivery boy opened the pack infront of me to show that no damage has occurred. 5 star for this.
Installation:-
1) The person from Jeeves has come and assembled the legs as I wanted only table mount. But the handling of TV by him was cumbersome and I see the bezel got a slight bent as he lifted the TV by holding just one of its leg. These electronics are so delicate and costly. A well trained person would hold and lift the TV carefully with 2 hands. I hope I am not going to face any display issues due to this.
2) The person from Jeeves only checked whether the TV is working for AV input. A responsible company will train its technicians to check AV, USB, HDMI ports for any faults and show the customer that all the inputs are fine and then confirm that the delivery and installation is fine.
TV performance:-
The display is above average but if you are buying 43 inches the distance has to be at least 10 feet. Else the clarity will not be satisfactory for SD channels.
I did not take smart TV. So I loaded few movies in MKV format on pen drive and watched them on TV. They look perfect.

Overall the TV is good. Go for it. But the Jeeves service needs improvement and the company has to train them on handling the TV as it is someone's hard earned money and they should check at least three inputs AV, USB,HDMI.
TV rating is 3.5. But I am giving the rating as 3 as the service needs improvement.
Shall update my review probably after using it for a month. I hope the after sales service is good with cloudwalker. Lets see.

Regards,
G Arun Kumar
Product delivered and installed the same day. Must say a quick service and installation. Great service from cloud walker. Amazing customer support and best quality tv. Definitely a must buy.

I'm 4 months used after Writing this review. CloudWalker tv is awesome TV no issues til now. it support 1080p Full HD Screen quality is very good. Multi Audio Video Files is not support in usb drive other wise no issues and all video format work well. my bad luck is after i purchased item 1000 down. HD CHANNELS is super clarity I'm used Airtel HD setup Box. TV Speakers are very Loudly very good quality Box Speakers used in this tv. and I'm Tanix TX3 Max Android TV Box used it is Support 4k Videos. after I use this tv box my tv normal tv to smart to converted. Lowest Price Awesome Tv Received My Family is also Very Happy.

Good built in quality. Bazels are thin. Viewing angle is good. Remot control built in quality is good. User interface is friendly n easy to understand. Upscaing video processing is good n overall output of SD channels is fine. HD channels are shown uo to the mark. Ports are divided, some are kept on bottom to the panel n rest are kept on left side back to the panel. All are easily reachable n accessible. Booting time is normal. Sound output is loud n clear enough to listen in 25*20 sitting room. Surround sound gives theater like sound effects. Mounting clamps are strong enough to hold the TV unit. I have 32 inch samsung smart TV too at home n found cloudwalker gives a great picture quality and good sound output. I'm totally satisfied with it's performance n found this product is truly value for money. I purchased this unit on 14th January with amount of 19999 n was delivered on 16th n installation procedure was carried out on 18th.

Firstly, its a great product no matter what for its price. Fast shipping. Bought this for 19,999 including 2 year extended warranty by jeeves.

Making it simple.
Pros,

Picture clarity is superb for this price range. Viewing angle is good. Comes with IPS panel. Contrast ratio is good. Comes with all accessories in the box.
Less bezzel which makes the tv looks big.

Cons:
Firstly the finish is kinda cheap with all those transparent buttons at the bottom.
Sound clarity is poor had to buy a 2 channel panasonic to fix it.
Ports are not numbered/named, had to refer the manual everytime i want to use any of the ports.
Audio doesn't cut off in the tv when headphones are plugged in. Which is kinda odd because even after muting head phone still recieves audio.
Menu function could have been better.

Overall:
If you are on a budget and want a bigger tv. Definitely go with this. Spend couple of ks for a good sound system. Which is not bad comparing the price of the tv. Definitely worth the buy.

At first flipkart service is too good ,same day installation.after 10 months my review
Could walker tv 43inch full hd
Picture quality fantastic for HD & normal
Sound all over good
3USB
3HDMI
Box surrounding sound
Ips a grade panel Crystal qlty pic
this product value for money .
Good product, worth every rupee paid. One issue is that the TV does not support Digital Dolbey sound hence no DD sound when using HD channels in DTH, normal sound work just fine

1. TV delivered on time, Installation done wid the jeeves technician.
2. Packing and delivering product is good.
3. It supports only few formats of HD videos.
4. Display could be much better but for the price its worth.
5. Overall good product.

+ 19k for a 43" FHD TV
+ 2 HDMI, 3 USB
+ IPS Panel
+ Comparatively good build quality than other TVs in same price range
+ Next day only both delivery and installation done

- .mkv movies audio won't play
- Poor display for Std definition content (non-HD)
- Speakers not so good , external speakers required
- TV Remote doesn't mute audio line out output (need to getup and mute :-))
- TV Remote control signals overlaps with set top box controls, for volume up it changes channels on STB
- With wall mount , HDMI USB ports not easily accessible

Tv display is Good.
Sound is just ok

Line out function volume cannot be controlled from tv remote. Means u cannot control the external sound system volume from tv remote control That is big problem.

Usb works fine
Pc in works fine
Hdmi works fine

Good build quality.

Very simple Software user interface.

For the cost tv is Nice

Flipkart service is Super.
Thanks.

i am writing this review after one month of usage.
pros:-
1very nice price. got the tv under 15k. this is a very attractive price for 43 inches tv.

cons:-
1. blur image. the image gets blurry when some fast moving scene s are on screen. the tv is not optimised for high fps shots.the image quality is not up to the mark.
2. audio:- if you are even a little bit choosy about sound, you will be highly unsatisfied with the speakers of the tv. the speakers seem to be of very cheap quality. i put my altec lensing speakers and outperform the tv audio by way too much margin.
3. remote.:- my remote died after 25 days of usage. called customer care and they told me that the remote will run only on duracel batteries. but in my case, even the duracel were unable to get the remote working.
4. the customer care:- i called the customer care several times but even after 10 days the dead remote is waiting to be replaced.

verdict:- not good. if you want a low cost tv then there are more brands available with some reliable customer care. try those. go for good refresh rate, some good audio output, and i suggest 4k for this screen size.

After 10 days of use..I recommend this tv ..best in class tv with low price... installed 2 hours After delivery ... clarity both sound and video is very good...cons is it play only selected format files... clarity is good with TACTV setup box
Full hd clarity is awesome and sound for external speakers is crisp and loud. Black is not completely pure black otherwise everything is perfect

TV was delivered on 23 jan and am writing this review on 25. Based on my limited usage picture quality is really good and sound is also very loud. I really liked the remote for functionality, my older tv was LG and in it, to change source was a huge task. But this remote has dedicated buttons to toggle for hdmi, usb, tv. Also dedicated button to change picture and sound mode. Installation by jeeves was thoroughly professional, with installation engineering coming at promised time and taking full care to not to spread dust caused by drilling. Thanks to Flipkart for making this purchase a pleasurable experience. five star to Flipkart, jeeves and last not the least Cloudwalker for excellent product

Great product. Superb picture clarity. Very easy to operate. Sound is ok and decent. The delivery was on time. The next day installation is done by Jeeves services which is probably a third party who has a tie up with Cloudwalker. Overall experience is nice. I am using the product and totally loved it. It is really a great deal for the price of Rs.19000 and quality of picture is not at all poor compared to products like sony, samsung or LG. Go for it guys. Thumbsup to Cloudwalker for such an amazing product at this prize range.

using it since last 3-4 months...picture quality is amazing..comparable to sony and samsung panel....panel is really ips standard..but sound is really below avg....still its value for money...hope its last 2-3 years ...
ps:for better picture clarity please watch this tv from 10 ft distance it will give you theater like experience..

I think it's one of the best online purchase from flip kart.... no scope of complaints on the product or service. I did not wanted the smart TV or android TV or 4k or curved TV.... because TV is meant to be TV and I don't like to play with it so I choose this simple LED and believe me it's a real bargain for the money. sound and picture is perfect. viewing distance is 10 ft and it gives a theatre like effect. guys, go for it if you don't want to play with your TV like a mobile.... Cheers!!

Excellent television at amazingly low price.I got it @ 16.5K at discounted price.Picture quality 5 star however for sound I would preferred to give 3 star. Five star to flipkart for customer support services as faced some issues during delivery & team has sorted it out immediately after raising the complaint.Installation done on delivery date, great service.Overall I would prefer 5 star for Television.
after 20 days watching the tv just awesome.full HD.picture quality better then others tv.100% satisfied.my 1st love my mom.my 2nd love cloud walker fullHD 43 inch LED tv.5***** of 5*****.👍👍👍👍👍

Review after Two days of use: Cloud Walker 43 inches full HD TV looks nice. Sound is good and picture quality is also nice. Everyone in family is happy. Chrome cast work damn fast with this t.v. compared to my old Sony LCD. Only issue is that it don't play sound for dual audio mkv movies like Hollywood dubbed ones. Rest all well, a decent buy in this price
Amazing LED panel with a nice outer frame. Worth buying.

Amazing picture quality and looks good.I am totally satisfied with this product but i am honestly speaking within this budget sound quality is average otherwise product is quite promising to meet your all expectations.

Excellent product.excellent sound and very nice vedio quality.recommeded to buy very good product at these price.dont think on negative comment you can buy by closing your eyes.one think pls keep in mind it is highly recommend to buy 1kv external stabilizer to safeguard your TV. internal stabilizer is additional security. 1kv stabilizer will cost around 1500-1800 buy these recommend it is special designed for LED TV.dont put normal stabilizer which is used for fridge and others purpose because they 330v.we required 1kv which is 1000v =1kv.overall 5star for the product.
Delivery was excellent from flipkart with nice packing and installation demo was also excellent

Order delivered by flipkart as per mentioned time. Installation and demo service by jeevas technician is also good. Product is very good and worth at that price.
Update after using for 2 months:
1) .mkv files audio not working. But I have connected my laptop to tv using hdmi and able to use all files.
2) For wallmount, usb connecting is bit difficult because very less space will be available backside. But u can use it by connecting with usb extender.
3) Customer care service of cloudwalker is not so gr8 in terms of responding to complaints, needs to be improved.
Overall so far so good and product worth at its price.

It is the best TV I have bought. It's looks elegant and picture quality is very good I didn't expected such a premium product for such a low price. Thank you cloud walker for giving such an amazing TV. The delivery was as promised by Flipkart and installation was also earlier than promised.
As of now an excellent viewing experience. Just loving the built quality, viewing angle, picture quality and many more after using it for a month. Highly recommended it. A true budget TV.....

Excellent product. Picture quality is great. Only thing viewing distance should be more than 10 feet. Connectivity options are awesome. Sound is good but you should connect home theater. Great purchase at this price. Thanks flipcart.

Pretty decent display, the installation was bit delayed as Jeeves team has not managed it professionally in the rural cities as they do it urban area.
Otherwise product is worth the money. I would like say do not compare it with Mi Smart TVs which are game changer.

Super TV picture quality super sound original quality super nice TV 9-4-2108
quickly delivery flipkart thanks to flipkart thanks thanks thanks to flipkart I like you flipkart

The wow moment is it got delivered very fast and the installation was done in a very neat way. TV is doing very good. I really appreciate this product for the price tag and picture, sound quality. Its been a week since I purchased this tv and I would say its a very nice tv to go for it without having any second thoughts.

I am writing this review after 2 days of use of TV basically did TV packaging delivery was excellent bye Flipkart LED TV panel is excellent bright looking the picture quality 180 p is amazing mawrellous when I compared to Samsung almost nothing difference for the price which I bought I am happy with the TV if I pay 2 times more for Samsung I see if anybody wants to buy a TV which the low budget you should go for this TV this is a honest review depending of the product which will be delivery by Flipkart .this is for flipkart checking the product before they deliver to the customer it will be very nice I bought something on Flipkart 2 months ago it was a juicer but this send me damage piece but I contact the company and they say they will fix the problem the TV brand has not much name in the Indian market but I took the chance to check and to be honest it is five star for me if it last then I will give them 10 stars but any Indians looking for low budget they should buy this TV instead of paying three times more for the branded TV thanks Flipkart for delivering a quality product lasting for the Flipkart thay should check the courier service how they handling the products sometimes a product get damage in transit

I work in a branded consumer electronics company. when think about of buying new TV in this size I only checked the price. when saw this 43 inch cloudWalker TV in flipkart with this cheap cost, really scared about quality of product. mostly 40 inch above led have complaint in display due to transportation , or when handling ( unloading from container or while stacking ). But this TV is superb beyond the thoughts . No words to describe. Just go for it without any doubt. Atleast having one own brand service centres in all states with periodic service coverage by technicians according to the requirements and good promo can maintain a good brand value and trust to the customers....I wish this brand to have a great success...☺☺☺
very good working well I happy to buy very good service Flipkart

Been about 2 months since I bought the TV. It has worked brilliantly so far. The sound could be slightly better but on the whole it's value for money.
For the price, I would recommend it.
picture quality is very good... sound is not that good but can be compensated with home theatre... overall very good product at this price.. TV look is awasom.... very decent finishing...

Excellent TV in this price, picture and sound Quality is Very good. It will be better if u plug in ANY CAST OR CHROME CAST to TV. Then you can play high graphics Games (with full sound) on your tv from Android mobile and as well as Youtube, Voot etc.

using this tv for more yhan 1month now with smazon fire stick.
good quality sound.
display quality is OK... not awesome... given the price i am satisfied.
together with fire stick, it cost me 22000 approx and enjoying almost smart tv now... totally worth it.
hope the tv lasts for 2-3 years
Super TV. Delivery on time. Quick installation. Very good picture quality. On par with best of the 43 inch TVs in the market. Value for money. Happy with my purchase.

picture quality is good but could have very good if more sharpness also energy saving mode or led light adjusting mode as in other brand even cheaper brand. But best in this price no one can beat. could have given 5 stars but bcoz of abvove mention 2 features missing. will strongly recomend even within price of rs 30k leds. compared with all other leds even samsung n sony only sharpness issue rest colour n all are very good. It works very good through USB but not that great with even HDMI. Over all value for money

Display is very good, picture quality is preety decent, sound is average....ports are well separated, some video formats are not supported but most of them are...overall satisfied with the product considering its price..

This is really a awesome TV in market. good deal.
I am really satisfied with Picture quality, sound quality and attractive build.
Value for money.. Basic tv but good picture and decent sound for everyday viewing... If you already have a chromecast or apple TV or fire stick - avoid spending on a smart TV!
Great Product for the price. Just go for it if you are on a budget. Picture quality is superb while sound quality is poor and service is also good with properly established help centers.
worth for money..... sound is Good... picture quality also nice . flilfkart delivery good (jeeves service technician not worth for insulation)
Good product its working nice ! Installation jeeves good response ,perfect TV and worth for money ,please go for it ....
Very cool tv . It looks very stylish and runs like butter. I am loving it

Awesome product .. full value for money . Also installation was perfect .
Good sound good quality no complains at this price .
Have taken extended warantee also its worth it .
we had best choice in full HD LED tv enjoyed alot super features in this budget while branded urged around 25k

Good delivery process from flipkart / ekart.... and excellent installation by jeevas.... tv unit is not satisfactory but i m satisfied as a low budget tv.in this price,a excellent purchase. picture quality is good but sound is not impressive...

Best Value Product, However the Quality is a low as promissed and shown over review. Viewing Quality is only superb at HD Display. Sound is Good at the promised watt. Flipcart delivery is very fast n superb.

Today on 8-3-18 I got installed my TV by Jeeves engineers and it's working well looking good and further info will be after thorogh after one week usage it's looks good and sound is even best while playing movies through USB.

Quality at this price is amazing if not mind blowing. Please do not compare it with other brands which are charging you 4-5 times of this product. Very satisfied with what I have.
Have been using it regularly for 4-5 hours for a month now and no issues yet. Delivery and installation was as usual perfect and on-time.

If you are low on budget,this is the right choice.
Delivery was pretty fast,the technician visit was also on time.
Built quality is good, awesome picture and sound quality.
The UI is a bit old and not so user friendly,but at 20k this is the best out in the market.

Wonderful product but with a big problem. Amazon Fire Stick is not working properly. It works but most of the movies are not playable.
Otherwise the picture quality is very good.
HDMI Ports 3
USB ports 2
You can use it as a gaming monitor as well.
At 20K it is Best.

But as I told in my first line.....Amazon Fire Stick???? tch tch.....

I am editing this Review as the problem has been Solved.
amazon Fire stick also working fine with no single problem. This TV is really something to boast. With such price You won't get anything better.

In fact my neighbour purchased MI TV 43 inch from XIAOMI. But I tell you...with Amazon Fires Stick Cloudwalker gives you better quality of service as Smart TV.
Mi TV 43 inches- ₹23,000/-
Cloudwalker 43 inch- ₹17,000/- with Amazon Fires stick of ₹3,000/- it is just ₹ 20,000/-.

I assure you picture quality is also better than MI TV. I touched the screen of both TVs and Xiaomi was showing some watery mark when pressed on screen but Cloudwalker didn't show anything.
Also, Amazon Prime and YouTube is not working properly on my neighbour's Xiaomi TV but with my Cloudwalker+Amazon Fires stick combo it works like gel....

Believe me it is way better than Xiaomi TV. Even my neighbour now agrees with my decision as we both purchased our TVs together.

Go for it blindly....and enjoy the best quality from an Indian Brand.

All right 6 months down the road....

Buy it guys for such low price its excellent...

What do you need a Tv with good sound and good picture quality?
Yes this is the TV that will solve the problem...

Go ahead pay more than 30k for other companies yes will get useless features but trust me limited features but the best ever....
super picture clertiy sound good.pen drive fast open super overall good. Nice for tv lovely

Delivered on 29th January 2018. 5 star for Gati Courrier. Very fast delivery. But Jeeves serve is very poor service. TV installed afeter 10 days. But TV is nice 5 star for this TV. Sound aur picture quality is awesome. It's a best option for low budget LED TV.
Delivery is good and right time. Installation also in time. Picture quality and sound is good others is latter because it's just for 2 days.

Please kindly don't purchase the product

Picture and sound quality best.I ordered on 31/12/17and delivered by 4/01/18 and install done on same day. Great service by flipkart. Till now no any problem. Great product. Must buy.

The TV picture quality is good. But issue with audio. Its not supporting Dolby digital and nobody seems to know that.
First after tv installation in only few tata sky channels audio was coming. Also audio was not coming in fire tv stick. But the guy kept saying it's issue with set top box even though every worked on my vu tv i replaced this with.
I raised a request to replace tv and people from cloud walker called and kept saying again issue with set top box. Finally i found it myself by disabling Dolby digital audio in both tata sky and fire tv stick

Thanks Flipkart for the next day delivery...and immediate installation... About TV Picture clarity it's super in non HD channels also... Sound also good.. overall I will give 9/10. ( After using one week)
